author: sdeboy
msg: modify xml decoders so additionalProperties override existing properties (allows, for example, the ability to load a set of saved events into a new tab in chainsaw, because chainsaw can modify the application/hostname properties that control event routing).
Also fixed a bug in additional properties loading.

author: oheger
msg: Moved internal update flag from FlagNodeHandler to FlatRootNode.

author: markt
msg: Extend fix for DBCP-8 to PerUserPoolDataSource
The fix is a little ugly to maintain binary compatibility in PoolKey - I really wanted to add password as a separate field
Unit tests all pass with fix applied

author: bmbouter
msg: This includes clone monitoring and management of thin versus thick efficiency.  This functionality will be explained in a future commit to the esxthin.README file.  This code has been tested and works.
